name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Masterlang - Learn new languages with movies

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The chrome extension to expand your vocabulary and master the language expressions. Available on Netflix, Prime Video and Disney+

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
UPDATE - Aug 2024: The extension is now fully working across Netflix, Disney+ and Amazon Prime Video

Learn new languages as you watch your favourite movies and TV shows on Netflix, Prime Video and Disney+

Masterlang allows you to consistently expand your vocabulary and master the language expressions.
Besides providing an instant translation of subtitles, Masterlang empowers you to build and track your own vocabulary making learning fun and effective.

Try now the extension for free.

New!
- Export your personal dictionary to flashcards (Compatible with Anki, Quizlet, Tinycards and Brainscape)
- Amazon Prime Video and Disney+ are now supported
- Set up your daily objective and make learning new terms a habit
- Train your listening skills by playing again specific subtitles

Please note that you need:
- an active account on Netflix, Prime Video or Disney+
- subtitles enabled

Languages supported:
Albanian
Afrikaans
Arabic
Armenian
Azerbaijan
Basque
Belarusian
Bosnian
